company_description:
Established in 1987, Marina Sirras & Associates LLC specializes in the placement of attorneys at all levels of experience in law firms and corporations in the United States and internationally, and provides consulting services, including office expansions, growth strategies, mergers and practice group acquisitions. In addition, we have developed expertise in placement of individuals in law firm administration and support staff. 

Marina Sirras & Associates LLC consists of a staff of professional recruiters who have been collectively involved in legal and executive search for more than fifty years. 

At present, along with conducting numerous searches for clients in New York and other cities across the United States, Marina Sirras & Associates LLC is actively recruiting candidates who are interested in working in Eastern and Western Europe, Asia (including China and Singapore) and Latin and South America. In our years of operation, we have developed a client base that has interests around the world. 

By using our recruiting services, you get all of the benefits of our years of experience, as well as one-on-one attention to your search. We advise you on availabilities within the market, help with resume drafting and development of business plans and related materials. We also advise you as to the unique personalities of different law firms in order to provide you with the best possible firm match. Candidates work directly with an experienced recruiter. 

In addition, Marina Sirras & Associates LLC is an active member of the National Association of Legal Search Consultants (NALSC). We strictly adhere to the NALSC Code of Ethics.

company_description:
NCHCR was formed in March 2005 recognizing the fact that the Independent Healthcare Recruiters needed an exclusive Coalition to provide them with the resources larger corporations utilize. In addition to the historical activities of recruiters, the Independent Physician Recruiter meets specific needs the In-House recruiter cannot. These include assisting candidates with anonymous searches and representing clients for proprietary opportunities they do not want to publicly conduct.

By banding together NCHCR members represent a significant recruiting presence in the industry. As a group, we share common strengths and long term relationships with both our clients and physicians. NCHCR promotes the fact that the Independent Physician Recruiter plays a critical role in the Physician market, both permanent & locum. This is daily evidenced through participation on our nationally advertised job board, split rich networking environment, locum placement service, co-op programs, and adherence to a high ethical business standards and recruiting protocols.

In addition to bar operations, our bartenders are some of the most valuable brand ambassadors you can find. We have solved this problem through our recruitment strategies, our staff benefits, and our unique certification process.

company_description:
The Tayler Group is a privately owned Executive Search and Talent Advisory firm with offices in New York, Miami, and London.

We focus exclusively on executive-level and commercially focused roles within our four core markets - Management Consulting and professional services firms, Software Vendors, Industry Disruptors, and the Investor Community.

Our clients are high growth and industry specialized firms, that often do not possess the brand equity to attract top talent by themselves.  We believe in an "extraction-focused" approach to search – we take the time to learn about our clients in detail so that we can tell a compelling story to the market which allows us to provide them with candidates they would not normally be able to reach.    

Below are examples of firms we represent:

•Small, high-growth technology firms with recent investment, who require a specialist to tell their story and support them in expanding their Executive Team. 
•Mid-sized firms looking to hire leaders in line with a revised or fresh strategic direction. 
•Established firms looking to build out a new business area and require innovative leaders to drive growth.

company_description:
Partner with Paramount Placement:

Welcome to Paramount Placement.  We connect exceptional talent with outstanding opportunities.  Our personalized approach, industry expertise, and innovative strategies ensure tailored solutions for clients.  We handle every aspect of the hiring process with professionalism and efficiency. 

With over 60 direct employees and rapidly growing, our vision is simple: to provide a no-risk, cost effective, money back guaranteed service, that will eliminate hiring headaches for businesses in all 50 states by putting our candidate's goals and client's needs first.  Specializing in the placement of Skilled Labor, Professional Services, and Healthcare candidates.

Partner with us today to find your next great hire - click here to view open positions. https://www.indeed.com/cmp/Paramount-Placement


Our Story: 

Founded in 2017 by our esteemed President, Steve Smith, Paramount Placement emerged from humble beginnings as a spare bedroom operation. With nearly a decade of industry experience, Steve made the bold decision to depart from his Director-level position and establish Paramount Placement. The primary objective was to provide a hands-on and highly customizable staffing solution that caters to the needs of both candidates and clients.

Driven by a passion to revolutionize the field of recruitment and transform the way clients engage with hiring and talent management services, Paramount Placement has successfully disrupted the industry. Through tireless dedication to refining the recruitment process, our company has distinguished itself as an innovative trailblazer, offering a fresh perspective on the perennial challenge of acquiring skilled and qualified talent.

company_description:
As an award-winning recruitment consultancy, Recruit 12 has been engineering success for world-class organisations for over 20 years. 

We specialise in sourcing niche, high-calibre engineers who drive innovation in some of the most impactful global projects. 
From providing expertise to decommission Fukushima's nuclear power station to delivering advanced engineers transforming Formula E, we are proud to be part of industry-defining advancements that promote sustainability and environmental progress.

Our Expertise is split across 4 specialist units:

Advanced Technologies
With 20 years' experience, we specialise in sectors such as Aerospace, Defence, R&D, Medical Devices, Semiconductors, and emerging technologies like EV and Autonomous Vehicles.

EV & Battery Technology
We connect businesses with highly skilled engineers in the Automotive and Battery Technology sectors, supporting net-zero goals and driving growth in a competitive industry.

Automotive Manufacturing
With decades of experience, we specialise in recruiting for automotive, aerospace, electronics, packaging, and FMCG, optimising operations and recruiting top talent.

Nuclear & Renewable Energy
We provide skilled engineers to leading energy organisations, supporting critical projects like Fukushima decommissioning and driving success in the nuclear and renewable sectors.

As an award-winning recruitment partner, Recruit 12 is committed to delivering world-class talent that shapes the future of global industries. 
Whether your business is pioneering new technologies, accelerating sustainability efforts, or optimizing manufacturing operations, our specialized recruitment services ensure that you have the best engineers in place to meet your challenges head-on.

company_description:
The Dubin Group is a Philadelphia-area staffing & recruiting firm specializing in temporary and direct hire placement of business professionals, including accounting/finance, office/legal support & human resources roles. Services include Outplacement Workshops/Seminars and Employment Screening. Founded in 1998, the company is a seven-time winner of the Philadelphia Business Journal's "Best Places to Work", and consistently ranks in the top 10 of their Executive Recruiters Contingency Search Firms list. They've been named winners of the SmartCEO Magazine Corporate Culture Award and the Main Line Chamber of Commerce "Main Line Gives Back" Award.

OUR MISSION: Moving the Delaware Valley forward, one job at a time.

OUR VISION: To become the leading temporary & direct hire staffing and personnel servicing firm in the Delaware Valley by understanding the individual needs of our clients: without sacrificing service, quality or professionalism.

CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY: The Dubin Group's overarching responsibility is to assist our clients, candidates and internal employees in meeting their goals. We recognize we can make a difference in the success of our stakeholders and believe fulfilling this responsibility is paramount. Doing so demands maintaining the highest ethical standards and a commitment to our core values of integrity, transparency, sustainability, diversity, innovation, continuous improvement and commitment to local community. The Dubin Group strives to honor all our core values in every aspect of our business. We define our corporate social responsibility as a daily obligation by our employees to actively pursue making a positive impact on our customers, suppliers, the local community, the environment and each other. Efforts include reducing our carbon footprint, engaging in philanthropic endeavors including volunteering, donating to local and national charities, as well as advocating and championing ethical and diverse labor practices.

company_description:
Capital Search is a full-service executive search firm providing Direct Hire, Executive Search, and Contract / Temporary services for employers in the Washington DC metropolitan region. Our client base ranges from multinational publicly traded corporations to early stage VC funded companies and represents a wide range of industries to include; technology and software, media, defense contracting, financial services, professional services, energy & green technology, education, entertainment, hospitality, real estate and construction, biotech, and non-profit organizations.

Our primary focus is Accounting & Finance (at all levels), however, we also handle searches for Human Resources, Sales & Marketing, Information Technology, General Counsel, CEO and Board level searches, etc.

For JOB SEEKERS, we offer total confidentiality, expertise in your industry/field and direct access to the best companies and opportunities in town. The value we place in getting to know our candidates is reflected in the long-lasting relationships we maintain with our clients. It's in our best interest to do a great job for you so that you tell your friends about us and think of Capital Search Group when building your staff in the future.

For EMPLOYERS, we go beyond headhunting and just matching candidates to employers. We begin by listening and working closely with our clients to understand the work environment, culture and specifics of their staffing needs. We have a proven track record with over 40 years of experience in the DC market. 75% of our business is from repeat and referral clients. We offer a "boutique" search firm style: our partners and recruiters work together on every project to fill your job quickly with A players. At CapSearch, we realize that our reputation as a highly regarded executive search firm is based not only on client satisfaction, but on professional excellence. We are committed to maintaining the highest possible standards of professional excellence in all that we do.
With a wealth of knowledge and decades of experience in the local D.C. market, we continue to earn a reputation for unparalleled customer service and bottom line results.

company_description:
We are fueling the success of agriculture by elevating talent across the industry. We are dedicated to connecting top talent with employers across the full supply chain of agriculture in the United States and Canada. Our clients range from small organizations to Fortune 500. We provide our clients with a wide range of talent solutions including full-service recruiting, candidate sourcing services, and job advertising packages. Our clients love our differentiated approach to recruiting and our passion for the industry. We are not transactional with our approach to recruitment; we are the strategic advisor for our clients and are known for our reputation of being extremely selective in our candidate submittals.

We work with clients in all facets of the ag industry including Agribusinesses, Farms, Food Production, Food Processors, Horticulture, Controlled Environment Ag, Grain Operations, Cooperatives, Produce, Specialty Crops, Agronomy, Seed, Ag Tech, Biotechnology, Biosciences, Animal Health, Livestock, Ag Equipment, Manufacturing, Engineering, and more.

Our services include Recruiting (Exclusive Contingency, Executive, Contract), Candidate Sourcing, Job Postings, Job Advertising, Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO), Background Checks, Talent Assessments, and other Custom HR and Recruiting Solutions.

company_description:
The Carlisle Group (TCG) is an international Executive Search & Recruitment firm with nearly three decades of experience in talent acquisition.  We specialize in consulting, coaching, and recruitment for a wide range of roles, from C-suite executives to key individual contributors.  This breadth of expertise enables us to form strong, strategic partnerships with our clients, addressing their most complex challenges with precision.

Our team comprises educated, adaptable, and skilled professionals dedicated to delivering customized solutions tailored to each client's unique needs.  With more than 6,000 successful placements and over 1,500 C-suite assignments, TCG has earned a reputation for comprehensive leadership search solutions across a diverse array of sectors.  Our clients include some of the most recognized names in Ingredients, Flavors, & Consumer Goods, Human Health & Nutrition, Pet Food, Animal Health & Nutrition, Food & Beverage Manufacturing, Industrial Manufacturing, Grocery Retail, Property & Casualty Insurance (P&C/MGA), as well as both Non-Profit and For-Profit Service Organizations.

We serve a diverse portfolio of clients spanning industries and sectors, including Fortune 500 companies, private equity firms, privately held enterprises, dynamic start-ups, global multinationals, and organizations across both for-profit and non-profit realms.  We partner with local, national, and international firms, offering tailored solutions to meet each client's unique needs.

At TCG, we are committed to navigating the intricacies of executive search to secure leaders who exceed expectations—individuals who are not only exceptionally qualified but truly transformational.

We're a independent, woman-owned staffing firm in Buffalo, NY that focuses on identifying and recruiting highly skilled and difficult-to-find job candidates for placement in direct hire, temporary and contract positions. Our business model is a down-to-earth, honest approach to placing people in jobs that they love.

And we believe in Buffalo. Our roots here are deep, and we are committed to contributing back to the community in a way no other industry can—by driving our local economy. We're people helping people, and we do it very well!

Headquartered in Buffalo, NY, we provide national and international search capabilities.

Our team is made up of staffing professionals with unique insight into a variety of industries and job niches.  KRG provides placement services in accounting & finance, administrative & clerical, engineering, insurance, IT, sales and marketing and manufacturing operations management. We offer specialty expertise in the areas of legal, medical and executive searches.

Key Resource Group was previously named to the Inc 500 list, having been identified as one of the fastest growing small businesses in the United States.  

We are proud of the relationships we've built in the Buffalo Niagara region by successfully placing candidates for over three decades.

Since 1983, we have filled thousands of positions ranging from entry level to executive and management for various industries including:  Pharmaceutical, Biotech, Clinical Research (CRO), Genomics & Medical Device, Food & Beverage, Market Research, Information Technology, Engineering & Manufacturing.

company_description:
If you're like most of our clients, your experience with recruiters is probably one of the following:

a) They sent us nobody.
b) The candidates were not close to what we asked for.
c) They sent me a bunch of unemployed job hoppers.
d) I've dealt with many and can't stand working with recruiters.
e) All of the above.

We recruit in the following:

Sales
Executive Recruiting
Account Management 
Customer Success
Marketing 
Operations 

Why are we different?

We've not just recruiters that have only worked in recruiting.  We have worked in Corporate America and understand both of our clients and candidates.

Typically, the best candidates we see are those that you can't find on job boards. Most recruiting firms have the same recruiting tools but we are much different.  Right Choice Resources employees have a large network so the majority of candidates we place are in our network. Therefore, we know they're not just good interviewers because in many cases, we know them personally or know people that do.

We go after the cream of the crop employees who are loved by their bosses and aren't looking to make a move.  Since most of have been top employees, we show them that although they are working a great job, why it makes sense to be open to a conversation.

In addition, we don't take on every client that contacts us.  If it's outside of our expertise or we don't believe we can deliver candidates, we take a polite pass and/or refer it over to another company we recommend.

company_description:
Visium Resources, Inc. was established in 2002 to service the staffing needs of commercial and government organizations throughout Florida and the Southeastern USA, and how it came to be is an interesting story. The Company was founded by a very experienced team of Staffing Industry professionals whose roots in the Temp staffing industry extend all the way back to the 1950's and 60's.

After individually creating, building, and managing their respective Staffing organizations, the two founders ultimately sold their organizations in the late 90's and retired to what they thought would be the "Good Life". Having spent many years serving together as Directors of a national industry Trade Organization they stayed in touch, and when retirement lost its luster, they decided to meld their skills and actively go back into the industry they both knew and loved. From that decision flowed Visium Resources Inc. A new organization that would take advantage of the industries newest technologies for the sake of efficiency, but had at its core, the principle of doing business on a very personal level, Personal, meaning People to People. With that guiding Core Principle, Visium has imbued its staff with the concept that our way of doing business is to be based on the premise that in every business transaction, we are always serving two customers. Customer one is our Client Company, of course, but customer two shall always be our valued Contract Employees. Both Customers are considered a virtual extension of the Visium "Family". After well over a decade of history behind us, it is safe to say that the application of that Core Principle has been validated,….. and it shall always be so. It is Our Way.

company_description:
Perry iSearch is one of the most respected and longest running Employment Agencies in the country. Founded in 1972 (under the name David Perry Associates Corp.), we began by placing people in the Consumer Packaged Goods Industry. By the early 1980's we were an established boutique national executive search firm. In 1986, a local staffing division was created (Perry Temps Inc. DBA Perry Resources). Since 1997, Legal Search Solutions has offered customized legal staffing solutions to law firms, businesses and corporate legal departments, non-profits, and associations. LSS provides direct-hire, temp to hire, and contract placement of legal personnel, including:

Attorneys
Paralegals
Legal Secretaries
Legal Support Staff
Legal Nurse Consultants
Contracts Administrators
Document Review Attorneys
E-Discovery Services

Direct-Hire Placement
Legal Search Solutions excels in recruiting, screening, and placing legal and corporate professionals at all levels. We identify new candidates through a number of sources: traditional recruiting, a comprehensive database, client and candidate referrals, and targeted advertising. 

Temp to Hire Placement
Legal Search provides clients and candidates the opportunity to assess the fit and performance prior to making the direct-hire. This ensures a quality placement for the client, while minimizing the firm's efforts in a time consuming process. This type of placement also gives contract employees the opportunity to see if a job is the right fit for them prior to committing to a permanent position. 

Contract / Temporary Placement
This is a  flexible staffing solution for the short-term placement of experienced attorneys, paralegals, and legal secretaries. These legal professionals can immediately step into a law firm or corporation to ensure that  workflow is maintained without disruption. All contract professionals are Legal Search Solutions employees.

company_description:
ABOUT MBS:
Management Business Solutions, Inc. (MBS) finds the right talent to help you meet your staffing needs. MBS is a recruiting firm founded in 2006 to provide practical, cost-effective, and customized employment solutions to local and nationwide clients alike. Our intentionally designed process allows us to find the right candidate for each position. Our focus area for staffing deliverables ranges from office clerical to supervisory and management roles up to the C-Suite. Our service deliverables include temporary, temporary-to-hire, contingency placement, executive
recruitment, and retainer solutions. 
With a historic and strong focus on identifying and representing diverse talents, MBS staff has over 75 years of combined experience in recruiting, staffing, interviewing, and sourcing – all key components in designing customized staffing solutions to meet our clients' needs. MBS recruiters take the extra steps to gain insights into our client's organization, culture, and employment methodologies – to develop a tailored, rigorous, and systematic process to meet our clients' needs on time and on budget. 

WHY WORK WITH MBS:
Our experience in representing diverse talents is in our corporate DNA; we take the extra step to identify an inclusive pool of candidates for our client openings and increase diverse candidate representations. 

Our results speak for themselves:
•	2022: 49% of our placements were diverse, and 72% of our hires were female
•	2021: 51% of our placements were diverse, and 73% of our hires were female
•	2020: 44% of our placements were diverse, and 78% of our hires were female
•	2019: 30% of our placements were diverse, and 71% of our hires were female

Management Business Solutions designs customized solutions for unique opportunities to meet the specialized needs of our client's staffing and recruiting requirements. 

Visit our website to Learn more!

The BIG Jobsite: Your Gateway to a Global Talent Pool. Expand your reach beyond traditional channels with The BIG Jobsite, our international jobs aggregation platform. Nurture Relationships: Engage with Job Seekers through Email Campaigns, keeping brand top-of-mind and fostering long-term relationships.

ATTB Group is your trusted partner in the ever-evolving recruitment landscape. We empower you to attract a wider audience, nurture relationships, and ultimately, generate new revenue opportunities. 
Contact us today and unlock the full potential of your recruitment network.
